course_description: This three-hour course will cover many of the major legal aspects of the employment relationship not treated in Labor Law. We will examine legal principles applicable to the hiring process, the key terms and conditions of employment, employment discrimination, occupational safety and health, employment termination, and post-employment issues.
sections: Class Nbr: 5007, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2-3:30p, Instructor: K. Cooper, Status: Open
